info.title: Settings Editor GUI
info.author: JoostinOnline, stfour
info.details:
Settings Editor GUI is a perfect add-on to postLoader, but it can be used on its own as well.  With it, you can change the following:
-Screen resolution
-Aspect ratio
-Sensor bar position
-Sound mode
-Wii remote rumble
-Screen burn-in reduction
-Shutdown mode
-Wii remote sensitivity
-WiiConnect24
-Internet Settings (boots directly into them)

Theme support is now available thanks to stfour
